New Records: Arshdeep Singh bowled 3 successive no-balls in his first over in Pune
Arshdeep has bowled 12 no-balls in his nascent T20I career
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka scored 55 without losing a wicket in the powerplay
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep's shocking first over helped Sri Lanka gain momentum
Others: Arshdeep first over-stepped in the 5th delivery of his fist over of the match
Arshdeep's hat-trick of no-balls took his no-ball tally in the nascent stage of his T20I career to 12
Arshdeep became the first Indian bowler to bowl 3 no-balls in an over in T20Is
